name: Covid Fighter
description:
You ARE the Covid Fighter!

Somewhere in America the Corona Virus has spread to its citizens. How long has it been here? You do not know, but now people are starting to show symptoms. Protect citizens from the spread of the virus and break the state free from lock-down. One way or another, the virus will run its course. How many can you save?

Instructions

The game will provide instructions. Here are some others that are not explained.

  • Quit: ESC
  • Music UP/Down: Plus/Minus
  • Mute Music: 0

This is not an easy to win game. I suggest you start with a smaller state to begin with.

Special Thanks to...

Artwork - CobbKobu
Maps - Tom Neal
Music - Antti Luode

DEV NOTES: This was made in two weeks. We had an aggressive schedule and alas we did not complete everything we wanted. Currently the only states we have maps for are Alaska, Alabama, California, Texas and New York. We had other major features we just did not have time to implement. Watch for an updated release in the future.
